alert.note: Alert for Evangeline; Northern Acadia; St. Landry (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 4:31PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Evangeline, northwestern Acadia and west central St. Landry Parishes through 500 PM CDT... At 431 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mowata, or near Iota, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Eunice, Iota, Chataignier, Mowata, Swords, Richard, Maxie and Savoy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
